title: Wellstar Medical Specialty - Acupuncture
author: Authority Board
description: Acupuncture provides treatment for a variety of conditions by inserting thin needles into the skin which replenishes and redirects energy flow throughout the body, regulating bodily function and promoting overall health.
cleaned_text: provides treatment for a variety of conditions by inserting thin needles into the skin which replenishes and redirects energy flow (Qi, pronounced "chee") throughout the body, regulating bodily function and promoting overall health. Understanding Acupuncture At Wellstar, we combine ancient Chinese acupuncture with modern medicinal practices to effectively treat various medical conditions, create balance and support emotional well-being. What We Treat - Stress disorder - Depression and anxiety (mild to moderate) - Headache or dizziness - Infertility - Scar - Pelvic pain and ovarian cyst - Blood pressure - Decreased immune function - Frequent cold or infection - Musculoskeletal pain—acute or chronic (neck, shoulder, back, elbow, wrist, hip, knee, foot) - Abdominal pain (irritable bowel syndrome, indigestion, fatty liver disease, GERD, stomach gas) - Palpitation - TMJ pain - Complex regional syndrome - Peripheral neuropathy - Sciatica during pregnancy - Postpartum depression
